name: Overture (itch)
description:
"Overture will kick your butt and not apologize." -HardcoreGamer.com

============================================

From the creators of the critically acclaimed --> SanctuaryRPG: Black Edition...

============================================

Overture is an action-adventure roguelike that allows you to explore vast and randomly generated dungeons, slay hordes of enemies, find companions to fight with, and upgrade your characters!

Read Overture's notable press mentions!

============= Features ====================

  • TWENTY-FOUR character classes!
  • Insanely challenging boss fights
  • 100% randomly generated dungeons
  • Tons of shiny loot and weapons
  • Intense nail-biting gameplay
  • Immersive chiptune soundtrack

============================================
